class.name: ComputePanoramaSkyMaterial
class.brief_description: A [Material] used with [Sky] to draw a background texture which is precomputed.
class.description:
This class is differs from [PanoramaSkyMaterial] in that it uses [RID] instead of [Texture2D] to set the panorama texture which resides on GPU. One need to generate panorama using GLSL compute shader first, then use [code] # copy the panorama from image2D output of a compute shader to a texture2D which is owned by RenderingServer. panorama_rid=RenderingServer.texture_rd_create(compute_panorama_rid) # save old panorama_rid for further disposal var old_panorama_rid=env.sky.sky_material.get_panorama() # set the panorama to this sky material WorldEnvironment.Environment.sky.sky_material.set_panorama(panorama_rid)
if old_panorama_rid: rd.free_rid(old_panorama_rid) # rd is the result of RenderingServer.get_rendering_device() [/code]
This class utilizes the mechanism first introduced in following PR:[https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/79288]. This [Material] can not be converted to shader as there is no sense to do so.

members.member: A [RID] of a [Texture2D] owned by RenderingServer to be applied to the [PanoramaSkyMaterial].
